name: clickn-circles
title: Clickn' Circles
description: A game made in pygame, and then again in Unity. A game to click circles. Don't press the red one, run the timed trials and see how many you can click in the time frame!

title: Ash Smoked Fishes Website
description: I made a site for my GrandFather using NextJS and Tailwind CSS. It's a site for a fish smoking company.

name: chronet-docs
title: Chronet Docs
description: A site I made for a gaming server that I'm the developer in, it is a docs site with various info about how to play etc...
